DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate patient pool PASI 90 responder Week 24 secukinumab 300 mg s.c. administer longer dose interval non-inferior secukinumab 300 mg s.c. every 4 week treatment respect maintain PASI 90 response rate Week 52 .
DOC.brief_title: Plaque Psoriasis Efficacy Safety With Secukinumab
DOC.criteria: Main 1 . Chronic plaquetype psoriasis diagnose least 6 month prior Screening candidate systemic therapy . 2 . Washout period detail protocol adhere . All prior nonpsoriasis concomitant treatment must stable dose detail protocol initiation study drug . 7 .
